task.summary: Default task
- ADD: Added an image search endpoint.
- ADD: Added an album search endpoint.
- ADD: Added database initialization code.
- FIX: Fixed issue with wrong paths in the ScriptRunner.
- ADD: Added javax.annotation library for Java11 compatibility.
- ADD: Added timeline view.
- DEL: Removed timeline endpoint.
- CHG: Replaced jackson with gson. - ADD: Added tag endpoints for adding and deleting tags from albums and images.
- CHG: Use file creation date as initial version for "created_on" on images. This makes sure that the images show up in the correct order even when the EXIF information hasn't been parsed yet.

- CHG: Made actual image file XMP tagging asynchronous. That means that the call can return to the client, but the images are still being processed in another thread. - FIX: Fixed an issue where tags that have no images associated with them would show up with a count of "1" on the tags page.
- ADD: Added (optional) inclusion of /dist/ directory from Vue.js client into the .war file.
- ADD: Added (optional) inclusion of /dist/ directory from Vue.js client into the .war file.
- FIX: Fixed an error with the random image endpoint.
- FIX: Fixed an error with the random image endpoint.
- CHG: Made small changes to automatically include the web application if placed under web/dist.
- ADD: Added logging to image scaling process. - FIX: Fixed an issue where thumbnails were created outside the image scaler.
- CHG: Adjusted number of CPU cores used for data import.
- CHG: Changed deploy path.
- FIX: Fixed an issue where tags were created that already existed.
- FIX: Fixed an issue where tags were created that already existed.
- ADD: Added download functionality to albums (download all images in an album as a zip).
- FIX: Fixed timezone issues.
- ADD: Added additional image size. Now SMALL, MEDIUM and ORIGINAL are supported. Medium has a height of 1080 pixels.
- ADD: Added authentication. - ADD: Added public images that can be shared with people even if Frickl is set to use authentication. -
- ADD: Added support for environmental variables to set admin username and password.
- ADD: Added support for environmental variables to set admin username and password.
- FIX: Fixed issues with compilation on Java 8.
- FIX: Replaced fetchOne with fetchAny.
- FIX: Included .sql files for database upgrades in .jar file.
- FIX: Fixed wrong order of database upgrade and SQL view creation.
- FIX: Added more exception printing.
- ADD: Added more database init logging.
- ADD: Added more database init logging.
- FIX: Fixed database existence check.
- CHG: Adjusted album view to support public views.
- CHG: Changed status call to return number of processed images and totals.
- CHG: Added new image scanner status of "scanning" to indicate the first part of the import process.
- CHG: Updated readme.
- ADD: Added Google Analytics tracking option. -
- ADD: Added endpoint for social media sharing which fakes an image extension.
- ADD: Added endpoint for social media sharing which generates a simple HTML file with the necessary meta tags.
- ADD: Added redirect for non-bots from image share URL to client.
- ADD: Added support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- ADD: Finalised support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- ADD: Finalised support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- ADD: Finalised support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- ADD: Finalised support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- ADD: Finalised support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- CHG: Moved build system from Ant to Gradle. - ADD: Added initial support for videos (ffmpeg required!).

MESSAGE.value: - CHG: Changed deploy path.
- FIX: Fixed an issue where tags were created that already existed.
- ADD: Added download functionality to albums (download all images in an album as a zip).
- FIX: Fixed timezone issues.
- ADD: Added additional image size. Now SMALL, MEDIUM and ORIGINAL are supported. Medium has a height of 1080 pixels.
- ADD: Added authentication. - ADD: Added public images that can be shared with people even if Frickl is set to use authentication. -
- ADD: Added support for environmental variables to set admin username and password.
- FIX: Fixed issues with compilation on Java 8.
- FIX: Replaced fetchOne with fetchAny.
- FIX: Included .sql files for database upgrades in .jar file.
- FIX: Fixed wrong order of database upgrade and SQL view creation.
- FIX: Added more exception printing.
- ADD: Added more database init logging.
- FIX: Fixed database existence check.
- CHG: Adjusted album view to support public views.
- CHG: Changed status call to return number of processed images and totals.
- CHG: Added new image scanner status of "scanning" to indicate the first part of the import process.
- CHG: Updated readme.
- ADD: Added Google Analytics tracking option. -
- ADD: Added endpoint for social media sharing which fakes an image extension.
- ADD: Added endpoint for social media sharing which generates a simple HTML file with the necessary meta tags.
- ADD: Added redirect for non-bots from image share URL to client.
- ADD: Added support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- ADD: Finalised support for access tokens generated to share with other people who can then access specific folders without being logged in and without these folder being public.
- CHG: Moved build system from Ant to Gradle. - ADD: Added initial support for videos (ffmpeg required!).

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - CHG: Moved build system from Ant to Gradle. - ADD: Added initial support for videos (ffmpeg required!).
